data.title: Chapters - Fraternity and Sorority Life
data.text:
Our Councils

The fraternity and sorority chapters at the University of South Carolina are led by four student-run councils including the College Panhellenic Association (CPA), Interfraternity Council (IFC), Cultural Greek Council (CGC), and National Pan-Hellenic Council (NPHC).

Annual Chapter Expectations

The Annual Chapter Expectations (ACE) Program allows the Office of Fraternity and Sorority Life to evaluate chapter performance as it relates to our minimum expectations of USC's fraternal organizations, and gives potential members additional information about our chapters, prior to them joining.

Fraternity and Sorority Chapters
